044package org.jfree.ui.about.resources;
045
046import java.awt.event.ActionEvent;
047import java.awt.event.KeyEvent;
048import java.util.ListResourceBundle;
049import javax.swing.KeyStroke;
050
051/**
052 * A resource bundle that stores all the user interface items that might need localisation.
053 *
054 * @author Thomas Meier
055 */
056public class AboutResources_de extends ListResourceBundle {
057
058    /**
059     * Default constructor.
060     */
061    public AboutResources_de() {
062    }
063    /**
064     * Returns the array of strings in the resource bundle.
065     *
066     * @return the resources.
067     */
068    public Object[][] getContents() {
069        return CONTENTS;
070    }
071
072    /** The resources to be localised. */
073    private static final Object[][] CONTENTS = {
074
075        {"about-frame.tab.about",             "\u00dcber"},
076        {"about-frame.tab.system",            "System"},
077        {"about-frame.tab.contributors",      "Entwickler"},
078        {"about-frame.tab.licence",           "Lizenz"},
079        {"about-frame.tab.libraries",         "Bibliotheken"},
080
081        {"contributors-table.column.name",    "Name:"},
082        {"contributors-table.column.contact", "Kontakt:"},
083
084        {"libraries-table.column.name",       "Name:"},
085        {"libraries-table.column.version",    "Version:"},
086        {"libraries-table.column.licence",    "Lizenz:"},
087        {"libraries-table.column.info",       "Zus. Information:"},
088
089        {"system-frame.title",                "Systemeigenschaften"},
090
091        {"system-frame.button.close",         "Schlie\u00dfen"},
092        {"system-frame.button.close.mnemonic", new Character('C')},
093
094        {"system-frame.menu.file",                "Datei" },
095        {"system-frame.menu.file.mnemonic",       new Character('D')},
096
097        {"system-frame.menu.file.close",          "Beenden" },
098        {"system-frame.menu.file.close.mnemonic", new Character('B')},
099
100        {"system-frame.menu.edit",                "Bearbeiten"},
101        {"system-frame.menu.edit.mnemonic",       new Character('B')},
102
103        {"system-frame.menu.edit.copy",           "Kopieren"},
104        {"system-frame.menu.edit.copy.mnemonic",  new Character('K')},
105
106        {"system-properties-table.column.name",   "Eigenschaft:"},
107        {"system-properties-table.column.value",  "Wert:"},
108
109        {"system-properties-panel.popup-menu.copy", "Kopieren"},
110        {"system-properties-panel.popup-menu.copy.accelerator",
111            KeyStroke.getKeyStroke(KeyEvent.VK_C, ActionEvent.CTRL_MASK)}
112
113    };
114
115}
